info.title: Platform
info.description: List of APIs for the Platform

/platform/bpctask.summary: To Get the Task Information for the given Process, Component , Activity and ILBO. It is used for Review Dashboard.
/platform/bpctask.description: To Get the Task Information for the given Process, Component , Activity and ILBO. It is used for Review Dashboard.

post.summary: To Get the Task Information for the given Process, Component , Activity and ILBO. It has been given as POST method since the inputs can be given in array format. It is used for Test scenario coverage in Review Dashboard.
post.description: To Get the Task Information for the given Process, Component , Activity and ILBO. It has been given as POST method since the inputs can be given in array format. It is used for Test scenario coverage in Review Dashboard.

/platform/ilbotask.summary: To get the Task information for the given customer, project, process, component, activity and an ilbo. It is used for Review Dashboard.
/platform/ilbotask.description: To get the Task information for the given customer, project, process, component, activity and an ilbo. It is used for Review Dashboard.

get.summary: To get the Task information for the given customer, project, process, component, activity and an ilbo. It is used for Review Dashboard.
get.description: To get the Task information for the given customer, project, process, component, activity and an ilbo. It is used for Review Dashboard.

/platform/sp_task.summary: Method to get the TaskName and Service Name for the given SP. It is used for Dependency Viewer.
/platform/sp_task.description: Method to get the TaskName and Service Name for the given SP. It is used for Dependency Viewer.

get.summary: Method to get the TaskName and Service Name for the given SP. It is used for Dependency Viewer.
get.description: Method to get the TaskName and Service Name for the given SP. It is used for Dependency Viewer.

/platform/task.summary: To Get the stored procedures for the given Task or Service. Request parameter controlFileName can be ignored. It is used for Dependency Viewer.
/platform/task.description: To Get the stored procedures for the given Task or Service. Request parameter controlFileName can be ignored. It is used for Dependency Viewer.

get.summary: To Get the stored procedures for the given Task or Service. Request parameter controlFileName can be ignored. It is used for Dependency Viewer.
get.description: To Get the stored procedures for the given Task or Service. Request parameter controlFileName can be ignored. It is used for Dependency Viewer.

core_rids.description: Authorization header using the Bearer scheme. Example: \"Authorization: Bearer {token}\"
